name: Parihaba
description:
Hi there! This is a prototype of a puzzle platformer with minimalist art style.

This is a simple game with simple mechanics. 

A/D or arrow keys to move left or right

Space bar to jump 

Hold the space bar for a higher jump

Interact with the object to complete the levels

The game has only 5 "levels" they are more of a room with some intractable.
